mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_hlist ( h_seq, h_category, h_title, h_address, h_content, h_tel, h_file ) VALUES ( seq_hlist.NEXTVAL, #{h_category}, #{h_title}, #{h_address}, #{h_content}, #{h_tel}, #{h_file} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_board SET h_category = #{h_category}, h_title = #{h_title}, h_address = #{h_address}, h_content = #{h_content}, h_tel = #{h_tel}, h_file = #{h_file} WHERE h_seq = #{seq}
